programme.title: Millennial Money

programme.desc: A childhood love of magic becomes a money making career. How a young musician turned his guitar into a 6-figure income. A couple reveals how they threw the wedding of their dreams for a fraction of the cost.

programme.desc: Kirstie and Phil search for a family home and business combo for the Sprys, moving from Scarborough. With a $275,000 budget and only one business per 500 houses, can they find the perfect match?

programme.title: Severance
programme.desc: A bonding weekend goes horribly wrong for seven colleagues who find themselves facing the chop when they are sabotaged by a deadly enemy. Only the smartest will survive this brutal office outing.

programme.title: Police Story 3: Super Cop
programme.desc: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: Late one night on a country road, Tun and Jane accidentally run over a mysterious pedestrian. Fleeing the scene, they return to their lives in Bangkok, but soon discover things have changed.

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
programme.desc: Teenagers are tortured, chopped up and impaled on meat hooks by a demented backwards family. This grisly 1974 blood-curdler ranks with Psycho and Halloween as a landmark in the horror/slasher genre.

programme.title: Terrifier
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Tara Heyes finds herself as the obsession of a sadistic murderer known as Art the Clown.

programme.title: Winnie the Pooh: Blood and Honey
programme.desc: After Christopher Robin abandons them for college, Pooh and Piglet embark on a bloody rampage as they search for a new source of food.

programme.title: Deliver Us
programme.desc: When a nun in a remote convent claims immaculate conception, priests investigate, concerned she will give birth to twin boys: one the Messiah, the other the Anti-Christ.

programme.title: The Raid
programme.desc: A SWAT team is trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs. Stranded on the sixth floor, they must fight their way through the city's worst to survive.

programme.title: Hell House LLC
programme.desc: Five years after 15 people were killed during a haunted house tour, a documentary crew visits the scene to investigate what really happened.

programme.title: The Hit
programme.desc: A hit man is sent to Spain to kidnap an ex-criminal and transport him to Paris for execution.

programme.title: Final Cut
programme.desc: Life imitates art when the cast and crew of a low-budget zombie flick start to turn into the living dead.

programme.title: Jungle
programme.desc: An enthusiastic young adventurer follows his dreams into the Amazon jungle with two friends and a guide with a mysterious past.

programme.title: Color Out Of Space
programme.desc: A family's retreat to rural life quickly crumbles when a meteorite crashes into their front yard. They attempt to battle a nebulous entity that they can barely understand.

programme.title: Crabs!
programme.desc: In the middle of prom night, a swarm of murderous crabs descends upon a small coastal town.

programme.title: Black Robe
programme.desc: In 1634 a Jesuit missionary sets out to convert the tribes in Huron Indian country. A culture-clashing masterpiece from Australian director Bruce Beresford.

programme.title: Black Robe
programme.desc: In 1634 a Jesuit missionary sets out to convert the tribes in Huron Indian country. A culture-clashing masterpiece from Australian director Bruce Beresford.

programme.title: Eyes Without a Face
programme.desc: A surgeon causes a car accident which leaves his daughter disfigured and goes to extreme lengths to give her a new face.

programme.title: Showgirls
programme.desc: Nomi Malone has what it takes to make it as a Las Vegas showgirl - what she doesn't have is a way in. To survive, she accepts the only job available, lap dancing at a seedy club.

programme.title: Demonic Toys
programme.desc: Two gunrunners and a pregnant policewoman (Tracy Scoggins) are trapped in a warehouse with a bad boy's toys.

programme.title: Demonic Toys: Personal Demons
programme.desc: A group of people on a world wide search for oddities find themselves trapped in a nine hundred year old Italian castle when they accidently unleash the Demonic Toys.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Paranoia drives this hi-tech cyber thriller when a computer programmer who turns to corporate espionage is caught in a spiral where even his own identity is put in doubt.

programme.title: Children of the Corn III: Urban Harvest
programme.desc: Act three in the horror series based on a Stephen King story. Two brothers are adopted by a family. Deadly occurrences follow, amid revelations that one boy was in a bizarre cult in Nebraska.

programme.title: Prisoners Of The Ghostland
programme.desc: In the treacherous frontier city of Samurai Town, a notorious criminal must break an evil curse in order to rescue an abducted girl who has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Hell House LLC II: The Abbadon Hotel
programme.desc: Eight years after a hotel's tragic opening, an investigative journalist is convinced key evidence remains in the abandoned hotel.

programme.title: Heathers
programme.desc: Veronica meets a James Dean-type newcomer who suggests they kill off the popular kids and end the cruel, unfair treatment the girls impose on unpopular kids at school.

programme.title: District B13: Ultimatum
programme.desc: Explosive sequel set in a futuristic Paris. Corrupt cops conspire to launch a nuclear strike and take over a ghetto terrorised by marauding drug gangs and killers. Subtitles.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, Chan Wing Yan goes undercover in the triads as Lau Kin Ming joins the police. Both sides face a common threat from a rival crime boss. (Subtitles)

programme.title: You Were Never Really Here
programme.desc: Joe is a hired gun who rescues trafficked girls, using brutal methods against those responsible.

programme.title: The Wind
programme.desc: Lizzy is settling a remote stretch of land on the 19th-century American frontier, when she begins to sense a sinister presence that seems to be borne of the land itself.

programme.title: Beyond Re-Animator
programme.desc: The imprisoned Dr West continues his gruesome experiments with the aid of the new jailhouse physician.

programme.title: Beyond Re-Animator
programme.desc: The imprisoned Dr West continues his gruesome experiments with the aid of the new jailhouse physician.

programme.title: Corrective Measures
programme.desc: When a powerless new inmate arrives at a prison for supervillains, he must choose his friends wisely, or become a pawn in the deadly game between the Warden and The Lobe.

programme.title: Good Boy
programme.desc: Christian, a millionaire heir, meets Sigrid, a young student, on a dating app. They hit it off, but there's only one problem: Christian lives with Frank, a man who dresses up and constantly acts like a dog.

programme.title: Sasquatch Sunset
programme.desc: In the misty forests of North America, a family of Sasquatches find themselves on a collision course with the ever-changing world around them.

programme.title: Vivarium
programme.desc: A young couple looking for the perfect home find themselves trapped in a mysterious labyrinth-like neighbourhood of identical houses.

programme.title: The Navigator: A Medieval Odyssey
programme.desc: A young 14th Century boy with acute psychic powers believes that he can rescue his fellow villagers by tunnelling their way through the earth. To their surprise they come out in New Zealand in 1988.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: When pregnant Ellie returns to her childhood home to complete a book, she's reunited with her mother. Consumed by dark memories of the house, she ends up unearthing a horrifying reality.

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
programme.desc: Teenagers are tortured, chopped up and impaled on meat hooks by a demented backwards family. This grisly 1974 blood-curdler ranks with Psycho and Halloween as a landmark in the horror/slasher genre.

programme.title: The Fall
programme.desc: A bedridden stuntman entrances a little girl with tales of exotic heroes. As his health reaches the point of peril so does the story he's telling, with dramatic consequences. An epic fantasy.

programme.title: You Don't Nomi
programme.desc: Trace Paul Verhoeven's Showgirls' redemptive journey from notorious flop to cult classic, and maybe even masterpiece.

programme.title: Children of the Corn
programme.desc: While driving through Nebraska two young lovers stumble upon a cult made up of murderous, demon-worshiping children. Based on a Stephen King horror story.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: A story told both forwards and backwards in time about an ex- insurance investigator, unable to remember new thoughts, who uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.

programme.title: Deliver Us
programme.desc: When a nun in a remote convent claims immaculate conception, priests investigate, concerned she will give birth to twin boys: one the Messiah, the other the Anti-Christ.

programme.title: Dark Diamond
programme.desc: After his father's death, a man vows vengeance against the relatives who abandoned him.

programme.title: Synchronic
programme.desc: Two New Orleans paramedics' lives are ripped apart after they encounter a series of horrific deaths linked to a designer drug with bizarre, other-worldly effects.

programme.title: Synchronic
programme.desc: Two New Orleans paramedics' lives are ripped apart after they encounter a series of horrific deaths linked to a designer drug with bizarre, other-worldly effects.

programme.title: Upstream Color
programme.desc: A woman is abducted and hypnotised with an organic material harvested from a specific flower. When she falls for a man, the two realise he may also have been subjected to the same process.

programme.title: What Lies Below
programme.desc: A 16-year-old girl returns home from camp and learns her mother has a new boyfriend, one she intends to marry; a man whose charm, intelligence and beauty make him look like he's not human at all.

programme.title: Oasis
programme.desc: An irresponsible and childish ex-con befriends a girl with cerebral palsy and develops a progressively stronger bond with her.

programme.title: Psycho Goreman
programme.desc: In this light-hearted yet violent cosmic, comedy adventure, an intergalactic warlord becomes enslaved to a pair of Earth children after they unwittingly resurrect him.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Detective Joe Kozenczak (Michael Riley) tracks down John Wayne Gacy (Brian Dennehy), convicted in 1980 of 33 Chicago serial killings.

programme.title: Jungle
programme.desc: An enthusiastic young adventurer follows his dreams into the Amazon jungle with two friends and a guide with a mysterious past.

programme.title: New Life
programme.desc: A mysterious woman on the run, and the resourceful fixer assigned to bring her in. Their two unique stories inextricably link, as the stakes of the pursuit rise to apocalyptic proportions.

programme.title: Vesper
programme.desc: Struggling to survive with her father after the collapse of Earth's ecosystem, 13-year-old Vesper must use her wits, strength and bio-hacking abilities to fight for the future.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: From their base in the city sewers, turtle heroes Michelangelo, Raphael, Leonardo and Donatello are on a mission to defeat an evil warlord and wipe out crime.

programme.title: Black Robe
programme.desc: In 1634 a Jesuit missionary sets out to convert the tribes in Huron Indian country. A culture-clashing masterpiece from Australian director Bruce Beresford.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Chen Wing Yan, a young police officer, has been sent undercover as a mole in the local mafia. Lau Kin Ming, a young mafia member, infiltrates the police force.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, Chan Wing Yan goes undercover in the triads as Lau Kin Ming joins the police. Both sides face a common threat from a rival crime boss. (Subtitles)

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, months after the first film, Ming suspects a superintendent is a triad mole, while years earlier, Yan undertakes his first mission. (Subtitles).

programme.title: The Crying Game

programme.title: The Hit
programme.desc: A hit man is sent to Spain to kidnap an ex-criminal and transport him to Paris for execution.

programme.title: Howling IV: The Original Nightmare
programme.desc: A successful author moves to a small town after suffering a mental breakdown and is tormented by demons and werewolves.

programme.title: Howling V: The Rebirth
programme.desc: A werewolf stalks an eclectic group of travellers on hand to attend the opening of a long-sealed European castle.

programme.title: Joint Security Area
programme.desc: After a shooting incident at the North-South Korean border DMZ leaves two North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss and Swedish team investigates what actually happened.

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A very handsome gentleman finds the love of his life, but suffers an accident and needs to have his face reconstructed through surgery after being severely disfigured.

programme.title: Showgirls
programme.desc: Nomi Malone has what it takes to make it as a Las Vegas showgirl - what she doesn't have is a way in. To survive, she accepts the only job available, lap dancing at a seedy club.

programme.title: The Parts You Lose
programme.desc: A young boy in a small North Dakota town befriends a potentially dangerous fugitive.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II
programme.desc: The heroes in a half-shell are back. Our fearsome foursome go after the glowing canister that has slipped into the hands of the evil Shredder and his mutant allies, Rahzar and Tokka.
